item.title: Karmin - Forget You
item.description:
I see you
driving ‘round town
With the guy
I love
And I’m like
forget you
I guess the change
in my pocket
Wasn’t enough I’m like
forget you
Baby
I’m sorry
I can’t afford
a Ferrari
But that don’t mean
I can’t get you there
Well I guess
she’s an Xbox
And I’m
more an Atari
But the way you play
your game ain’t fair
I pity
the fool
That falls in
love with you
Oh xhit
she’s a gold digger
Just thought
you should know you
I’ve got some
news for you yeah
Go run and tell your
little girlfriend

forget you

Now ain’t
that some xhit

I still
wish you the best

that I had to borrow
